titles.title: A bill to require certain public housing agencies to absorb port-in housing choice vouchers, and for other purposes.
A bill to require certain public housing agencies to absorb port-in housing choice vouchers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: This bill requires a public housing agency that uses less than 95% of its budget authority in a given year to accept a housing choice voucher from a family that received the voucher from an agency in a different jurisdiction.
